item.title: Install Chinese Input Method in Linux
item.author: Author
item.description: Install fcite packages in Manjaro 1 yay -Syu adobe-source-han-sans-otc-fonts adobe-source-han-serif-otc-fonts 1 yay -Syu fcitx fcitx-googlepinyin fcitx-im fcitx-configtool Config Environmental variables 1 vim ~/.profile add: 1 2 3 4 5 export GTK_IM_MODULE=fcitx export QT_IM_MODULE=fcitx export XMODIFIERS=@im=fcitx fcitx & 1 source .profile
